name: Protect the Elements
description:
Protect the Elements is a unique game concept featuring the elements of our world:

Fire, Water, Air, Ice, Electricity, Earth, and Neutral

You must defeat the evil elemental enemies that are trying to destroy the Elemental Battery. The Elemental Battery is the source of all Elemental energy and must be protected at all costs. The catch? The Elemental Battery can only power one tower at a time!

In this fast-paced, new concept, fun, and challenging game, you can be sure to have an amazing experience!

I hope you all enjoy this game as much as I enjoyed making it :)

P.S. You can freeze the game with the Pause Button to take a look at your situation!
